description: The Edmond Alumni Scholarship is open to students who are declared Accounting majors with a minimum 3.5 cumulative GPA, 45 hours completed at the time of application, and primarily provides most of their own financial support. The student must demonstrate financial need. Two faculty recommendations are required (please indicate the two College of Business faculty members on your application that you wish to have supply a recommendation). Eligibility Requirements Declared Accounting major Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.5 or higher Completed 45+ hours Primarily provides most of their own financial support Demonstrate financial need Two faculty recommendations are required (please indicate the two College of Business faculty members on your application that you wish to have supply a recommendation)

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major is Accounting   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Accounting
